name: Graffiti (Prototype)
description:
Graffiti is an action brawler on roller blades currently in development. A graffiti artist is bringing graffiti monsters to life, and you need to kick them back onto their walls.

Controls:

  • WASD to move. 
  • Space to jump. 
  • Double space to double jump. 
  • L Mouse to attack. 
  • L Shift to slide. 
  • N to restart. Quit to exit. 

Jump on rails to grind. Grinding and sliding build up charge that increases attack damage, knockback, and movement speed.

Please give us feedback on how it feels. We're trying to make this the best game it can be!

Concept art by Danielle Powers. https://www.artbydpowers.com/

Music credit to Moe Shop - Charm
